description: With the badge of this award, you gain access to another Airdrop game of the "Magic Voodoo Dolls" OG collection. 200 people can own one of these badges, there will only be 2 NFTs that are airdropped to these 200 people. To get an airdrop you need to retweet the corresponding tweet and hold one of these badges.
name: Launch day Airdrop Badge
